Pre-Game Insights: Iran are determined to secure their place in the AFC Asian Cup 2023 knockouts.
Hong Kong, China will try to fight back against a much superior opposition – Iran.
Iran will look to seal their RO16 qualifications with an impressive win over Hong Kong, China.
With a 90% likelihood of securing victory, Iran enter this match as the superior and more experienced side who will look to grab their second victory of the AFC Asian Cup 2023 campaign.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Taremi gained significant acclaim within the football community for his instrumental role in guiding Portuguese club Porto to last season’s league title, where he scored an impressive 22 goals – the highest in the league.
Everton Camargo, a 32-year-old forward, has introduced an element of speed and strength to the right flank of the lineup.
Hong Kong, China haven’t earned a win in their last six games.
Iran emerged victorious in the two sides’ previous meeting.
Injury and Team News: There is no news of injury in the Hong Kong, China squad whereas Iran will still miss the likes of Ali Gholizadeh who is injured.
Head-to-Head: Total Matches – 3, Hong Kong, China wins – 0, Iran wins – 3, Draws – 0
Others: The match will take place on January 19, 2024, at 11:30 GMT at the Education City Stadium (Al Rayyan).
The predicted lineup for Hong Kong (4-3-3): Yapp (GK), Law, Gerbig, Li, Sun, Lam, Chan, Tan, Camargo, Orr, Udebuluzor.
The predicted lineup for Iran (4-4-2): H Hosseini (GK), Rezeaian, Pouraliganji, Hosseini, Mohammadi, Gholizadeh, Nourollahi, Ezatollahi, Hajsafi, Azmoun, Taremi
